milestones.title: docs are disabled by default
milestones.description: transition node builder away from assuming all users want the docs protocol

milestones.title: pull custom protocols out of iroh
milestones.description: pull custom protocols out of iroh and into separate repositories

milestones.title: blobs, docs, and gossip are disabled by default
milestones.description: protocols remain in the codebase but must be explicitly enabled

milestones.title: Implement QUIC Address Discovery
milestones.description: Add QUIC Address Discovery functionality to `iroh-quinn`

milestones.title: Iroh CLI Deprecation Warning
milestones.description: warn users that the iroh CLI is deprecated and will be converted to an example in the next release

milestones.title: Iroh client Deprecation Warning
milestones.description: warn users that the iroh client is deprecated and will be converted to an example in the next release

milestones.title: net-tools repo
milestones.description: factor a number of networking tools out of iroh and into a separate repo

milestones.title: Add QUIC Address Discovery to iroh-relay
milestones.description: serve QUIC Address Discovery on the relay

milestones.title: blobs, docs, and gossip are removed from iroh
milestones.description: protocols exist in their own repos and are published separately from iroh

milestones.title: CLI is removed from iroh
milestones.description: there is no more CLI or Node in iroh, look at the specific protocols to play with a CLI centered around that protocol

milestones.title: iroh-net is now just iroh
milestones.description: we no longer publish `iroh-net`, `iroh` contains all of `iroh-net`

milestones.title: Add QUIC Address Discovery to `iroh-net-report`
milestones.description: net-report has QUIC Address Discovery probes

milestones.title: Auth on Relays
milestones.description: Blacklist or whitelist `NodeId`s on the relay

milestones.title: Iroh Doctor CLI v0.1
milestones.description: release the first version of the iroh doctor CLI as a standalone tool for diagnosing and reporting on connectivity

milestones.title: Add QUIC Address Discovery to `iroh`
milestones.description: iroh can launch QUIC Address Discovery probes

milestones.title: browser support
milestones.description: iroh compiles to web assembly and runs in the browser

milestones.title: User-defined data in Discovery
milestones.description: Allow users to publish and resolve a user-defined data.

milestones.title: Discovery stream subscription
milestones.description: Add simple API to allow users to subscribe to a stream of discoveries.

milestones.title: QUIC connections: graceful shutdown
milestones.description: finalize our APIs for graceful shutdown of QUIC connections

milestones.title: 0-RTT
milestones.description: iroh QUIC connections can now leverage 0-RTT

milestones.title: use Raw Public Keys (RFC 7250) in TLS
milestones.description: use Raw Public Keys instead of self-signed certificates in TLS

milestones.title: blobs 1.0 API
milestones.description: overhaul blobs API

milestones.title: QUIC Multipath support
milestones.description: implement QUIC multipath

milestones.title: iroh-blobs: multiprovider fan-in
milestones.description: Download data from multiple providers

milestones.title: relay connections over websockets
milestones.description: Connections to the relay happen over websockets

milestones.title: draft specification
milestones.description: draft a specification for the iroh protocol, outlining all open standards iroh uses, noting any deviations

milestones.title: QUIC NAT traversal
milestones.description: Using Quic to traverse NATs

milestones.title: Finalize FFI integration
milestones.description: protocol developers have a clear path for integrating rust protocols into other languages

milestones.title: Formalize Error Responses
milestones.description: transition from anyhow to thiserror in all critical code paths

milestones.title: finalize 1.0 spec
milestones.description: ratify the iroh 1.0 wire protocol

milestones.title: release candidate
milestones.description: publish a release candidate, seeking feedback from the community

milestones.title: documentation refinement
milestones.description: ensure documentation is accurate and robust

milestones.title: Party
milestones.description: That's it. All done. no more work left to do, ever. :)
